snippet: No. 19 Northern Illinois took a 44-37 victory over No. 18 Kent State in a stirring Mid-American Conference championship game in Detroit.
abstract: Northern Illinois defeats Kent State, 44-37, to win the Mid-American Conference championship; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: No. 19 Northern Illinois took a 44-37 victory over No. 18 Kent State in a stirring Mid-American Conference championship game in Detroit.

headline.seo: Northern Illinois Hangs on to Win M.A.C. Championship
